This API unsubscribes user from a Cobalt webhook events. ​ Request description ​ Body Parameters ​ webhook_event string required Webhooks event to unsubscribe. Accepted values are, connection-created , connection-deleted , workflow-completed , workflow-errored . ​ Response description 200 Error ​ webhook_url string Registered webhook url ​ webhook_events array Subscribed events.
